product_name: ExOfficio Pocatello Plaid Jacket - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: With the familiar style of your favorite flannel shirt but upgraded with lightweight insulation, the ExOfficio Pocatello Plaid shirt jacket delivers cozy softness and extra warmth for cool days. Soft cotton/polyester flannel fabric breathes naturally and feels soft against skin. Lightweight polyester insulation lining the body and sleeves adds extra warmth without being bulky or heavy. Internal drop-in media pocket and headphone cord clip keep you moving to the beat wherever you go. ExOfficio Pocatello Plaid shirt jacket features a fleece-lined collar, internal zippered security pocket and two front chest pockets. Closeout.
short_description: With the familiar style of your favorite flannel shirt but upgraded with lightweight insulation, the ExOfficio Pocatello Plaid shirt jacket delivers cozy softness and extra warmth for cool days.
